text: Prince Louis hasn't been seen in public since he made his debut on the steps of the Lindo Wing back on April 23. But today, three generations of royal family members, including the Prince Charles and Camilla, along with some of Will and Kate's closest friends gathered in the Chapel Royal of St. James’s Palace in London to celebrate the christening of the 2 1/2-month-old. See all the photos from the day below.
authors: As The Digital Director For Town
title: See Kate Middleton, Prince William, and Prince Charles at Royal Baby's Baptism

og.title: See Every Photo from Prince Louis's Touching Christening
og.description: Three generations of royals came together to watch the baptism ceremony in London today.
